Package com.xhive.error

This package holds the XhiveException class.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Assert Helper class wich make it easy to check assertions throws an exception when an assertion is false
XhiveExceptionResourceBundle Base class for exception resourcebundles
XhiveExceptionResources English/Us locale resources for exception messages Needs to be public for testing
 

Exception Summary
XhiveDeadlockException Exception to indicate that a deadlock occurred while attempting to acquire a lock on a database object.
XhiveException  
XhiveExceptionBase  
XhiveInterruptedException Exception to indicate that a database operation was interrupted using XhiveSessionIf.interrupt().
XhiveLockNotGrantedException Exception to indicate that a lock on a database object could not be acquired.
 

Package com.xhive.error Description

This package holds the XhiveException class. Most methods in X-Hive may throw an XhiveException, a RuntimeException, which represents different kinds of exceptions:

  • Connection related exceptions (including incorrectly initialized connections and transactions).
  • Database related exceptions (including locking exceptions and authority exceptions, and exceptions related to missing or duplicate data).
  • Parameter exceptions (exceptions thrown because of wrongly passed parameters).
  • And other exceptions related to the specific modules.
There is only one exception class used within X-Hive/DB, the different exceptions can be identified by their error-code and the associated message.
